Handle_Time_vs_Goal__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    NOT(ISBLANK(Total_Handle_Time__c)),
    (Goal__r.Goal_Total_Handle_Time__c > 0),
    NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Most_Recent_Step__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c)))
  ),   
  CASE(TEXT(Most_Recent_Step__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c),
    "Hours", (Total_Handle_Time__c * 24),
    "Days", Total_Handle_Time__c,
    "Weekdays",  Cycle_Time_Weekdays__c   ,
    null
    )/ Goal__r.Goal_Total_Handle_Time__c 
  ,null
)
Handle_Time_vs_Goal__c.inlineHelpText: Total time spent in this process as compared with the goal for cycle time
Handle_Time_vs_Goal__c.label: Cycle Time vs Goal

Flow_Completion_Date__c.inlineHelpText: Latest date a terminal Step was reached
Flow_Completion_Date__c.label: Flow Completion Date

Next_Breach_At__c.inlineHelpText: The time the current Step will Breach its goal at
Next_Breach_At__c.label: Next Breach At

Days_to_first_Step_Weekdays__c.description: Time from start of process to first Step change (in weekdays). Note that weekday calculations round up to the nearest whole day
Days_to_first_Step_Weekdays__c.formula:
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(First_Step_Taken_at_or_NOW__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(First_Step_Taken_at_or_NOW__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
-
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE(Flow_Creation_Date_or_CREATED__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( DATEVALUE(Flow_Creation_Date_or_CREATED__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
Days_to_first_Step_Weekdays__c.inlineHelpText: Time from start of process to first Step change (in weekdays). Note that weekday calculations round up to the nearest whole day
Days_to_first_Step_Weekdays__c.label: Response Time (weekdays)

Tracked_Object_ID__c.description: Holds the ID of the specific Salesforce record that the Flow is monitoring. Although the ID is raw, the type of object might be inferred through further lookup.
Tracked_Object_ID__c.inlineHelpText: ID of the Tracked Object instance
Tracked_Object_ID__c.label: Tracked Object ID

Match_Goal_with_Flows__c.inlineHelpText: Use this checkbox to connect this goal to any flows that match (same tracked Object & Field, and if provided, Type).
Match_Goal_with_Flows__c.label: Match Goal with Historical Trackers?

First_Step_Taken_at_or_NOW__c.description: Used in other formulas for error handling
First_Step_Taken_at_or_NOW__c.label: First Step Taken At or NOW

Goal_Total_Handle_Time__c.inlineHelpText: Total time your process should take. This field is expressed in the Units used on the Goal object
Goal_Total_Handle_Time__c.label: Goal Cycle Time

Goal__c.label: Goal Flow
Goal__c.relationshipLabel: Tracker Flows with this Goal Flow

Flow_Creation_Date_or_CREATED__c.description: Flow creation date is editable. Created isnt. This favors the former but defaults to the latter.
Flow_Creation_Date_or_CREATED__c.label: Flow Creation Date or CREATED

Type__c.description: Optional field that classifies different flows to support diversified goal setting and tracking modes within the same object.
Type__c.inlineHelpText: Used to split different types of processes handled within the same object. If your process was held in an Onboarding object, you might have a Customer and Partner type of process, for example.
Type__c.label: Type

Days_to_first_Step__c.description: Time from start of process to first Step change (in days)
Days_to_first_Step__c.inlineHelpText: Time from start of process to first Step change (in days)
Days_to_first_Step__c.label: Response Time (days)

Days_since_Completion__c.formula:
IF(
	NOT(ISBLANK(Flow_Completion_Date__c)),
	IF(
		Flow_Completion_Date__c < NOW(),
		NOW() - Flow_Completion_Date__c,
		null
	),
	null
)
Days_since_Completion__c.inlineHelpText: If finished, the number of days since it finished. Can be used to clean up old data no longer needed
Days_since_Completion__c.label: Days Since Completion

Tracked_Field_Name__c.description: Specifies the field within the tracked object that the Flow is monitoring.
Tracked_Field_Name__c.inlineHelpText: API Name of the field where changes are tracked
Tracked_Field_Name__c.label: Tracked Field Name

Tracked_Object__c.description: Contains the name of the Salesforce object being tracked by the Flow, providing context to the tracked object ID.
Tracked_Object__c.inlineHelpText: API Name of the Object being tracked
Tracked_Object__c.label: Tracked Object

TimeSinceBreach__c.formula:
IF(
	AND(
		NOT(Terminal_Stage__c),
		NOT(isGoal__c)
	),
	MAX(
		IF(
			NOT(ISBLANK(BreachTime__c)),
			IF(
				NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c)),
				Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c - BreachTime__c,
				NOW()-BreachTime__c
			),
			null
		),
		0
	),
	null
)
TimeSinceBreach__c.inlineHelpText: Time since breach in days. Stops when the next Step is reached
TimeSinceBreach__c.label: Time Since Breach (in days)

Handle_Time_vs_Goal__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c)),
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Handle_Time__c)),
    NOT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c = 0),
    NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c)))
  ),   
  CASE(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c),
    "Hours", (Step_Handle_Time__c * 24),
    "Days", Step_Handle_Time__c,
    "Weekdays", HandleTimeWeekdays__c,
    null
    )/Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c
  ,null
)
Handle_Time_vs_Goal__c.label: (Deprecated) Handle Time vs Goal

Final_Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.description: Note this field is rounded up to full days
Final_Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.inlineHelpText: Note this field is rounded up to full days
Final_Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.label: Final Handle Time (weekdays)

GoalBreached__c.inlineHelpText: Used to flag when something spends more time in a stage than the Goal
GoalBreached__c.label: Goal Breached

TimeUntilBreach__c.inlineHelpText: Time remaining until the goal for completing this Step is surpassed
TimeUntilBreach__c.label: Time Until Breach (in days)

Time_since_breach_in_hrs__c.formula:
IF(
	AND(
		NOT(Terminal_Stage__c),
		NOT(isGoal__c)
	),
	MAX(
		IF(
			NOT(ISBLANK(BreachTime__c)),
			IF(
				NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c)),
				Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c - BreachTime__c,
				NOW()-BreachTime__c
			),
			null
		),
		0
	),
	null
)
Time_since_breach_in_hrs__c.inlineHelpText: Time since breach in days. Stops when the next Step is reached
Time_since_breach_in_hrs__c.label: (Deprecated) Time Since Breach (in days)

Next_Step_vs_Goal_Next_Step__c.formula:
IF(
  NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c)),
  IF(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c = Field_Value_Ending__c,
    "Matched goal",
    "Deviated from goal"
  ),
  "Unknown"
)
Next_Step_vs_Goal_Next_Step__c.inlineHelpText: Describes whether stages were followed in the order prescribed by the Goal
Next_Step_vs_Goal_Next_Step__c.label: (Deprecated) Next Step vs Goal Next Step

NextStepVsGoalNextStep__c.formula:
IF(
  NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c)),
  IF(Step_Goal__r.Field_Value_Ending__c = Field_Value_Ending__c,
    "Matched goal",
    "Deviated from goal"
  ),
  "Unknown"
)
NextStepVsGoalNextStep__c.inlineHelpText: Describes whether stages were followed in the order prescribed by the Goal
NextStepVsGoalNextStep__c.label: Next Step vs Goal Next Step

Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c.description: Marks the timestamp for the initiation of the tracked Step in the process flow.
Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c.label: Step Started At

Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c.description: Captures the timestamp for the conclusion of the tracked Step in the process flow.
Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c.label: Step Ended At

Terminal_Stage__c.description: Indicates when the Step is at its final sequence, signaling that tracking is completed.
Terminal_Stage__c.label: Is Final Step?

BreachTime__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(   
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c)), 
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__c )),
    NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c))) 
  ), 
  CASE(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c),
    "Days", (Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c),
    "Hours", (Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c + (Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c/24)),
    "Weekdays", 
    DATETIMEVALUE(CASE( 
      MOD(StartDate__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ),
      3, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      4, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      5, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      6, StartDate__c + 1 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      StartDate__c + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c
    )),
    null
  ),
  null
)
BreachTime__c.inlineHelpText: Based on the goal, when this stage will be breached if not competed by this date/time
BreachTime__c.label: Breach Happens At

EndTimestamp__c.inlineHelpText: Used in formula fields for handle time
EndTimestamp__c.label: Ending Timestamp or NOW

Breach_happens_at__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(   
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c)), 
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__c )),
    NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c))) 
  ), 
  CASE(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c),
    "Days", (Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c),
    "Hours", (Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c + (Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c/24)),
    "Weekdays", 
    DATETIMEVALUE(CASE( 
      MOD(StartDate__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ),
      3, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      4, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      5, StartDate__c + 2 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      6, StartDate__c + 1 + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c,
      StartDate__c + Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c
    )),
    null
  ),
  null
)
Breach_happens_at__c.inlineHelpText: Based on the goal, when this stage will be breached if not competed by this date/time
Breach_happens_at__c.label: (Deprecated) Breach Happens At

FlowGoalID__c.description: Used by: Assign Step Goal to Steps with matching Flow Goal
FlowGoalID__c.label: Goal Flow: ID

Success__c.description: Check this if this final step means you've accomplished the intended outcome of your process. For Example: Closed Won, Closed, Converted, Completed, Finished, Approved etc.
Success__c.inlineHelpText: Check this if this final step means you've accomplished the intended outcome of your process. For Example: Closed Won, Closed, Converted, Completed, Finished, Approved etc.
Success__c.label: Process Succeeded?

Goal_Breached__c.inlineHelpText: Used to flag when something spends more time in a stage than the Goal
Goal_Breached__c.label: (Deprecated) Goal Breached

Sequence__c.description: Reflects the order of operations or events being tracked in a Step. Incrementing values signify following steps in the sequence.
Sequence__c.label: Order

HandleTimeWeekend__c.description: Note that this field is imprecise - it is just the total time (a number of days with decimal points) minus the weekdays, which are rounded up to the whole day. It is useful for adjusting time calculations to weekdays.
HandleTimeWeekend__c.inlineHelpText: Note that this field is imprecise - it is just the total time (a number of days with decimal points) minus the weekdays, which are rounded up to the whole day. It is useful for adjusting time calculations to weekdays.
HandleTimeWeekend__c.label: Handle Time (over Weekend Days)

HandleTimeWeekdays__c.description: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
HandleTimeWeekdays__c.formula:
IF( AND (Terminal_Stage__c, ISBLANK( Next_Step__c )) ,
null,
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( EndTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(
DATEVALUE(EndTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
-
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( InitialTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(
DATEVALUE(InitialTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
)
HandleTimeWeekdays__c.inlineHelpText: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
HandleTimeWeekdays__c.label: Handle Time (Weekdays in this Step)

StartDate__c.description: Used in calculation for Breach Happens At
StartDate__c.label: Step Started Date

HandleTimeVsGoal__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c)),
    NOT(ISBLANK(Step_Handle_Time__c)),
    NOT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c = 0),
    NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c)))
  ),   
  CASE(TEXT(Step_Goal__r.Goal_Measured_In_units__c),
    "Hours", (Step_Handle_Time__c * 24),
    "Days", Step_Handle_Time__c,
    "Weekdays", HandleTimeWeekdays__c,
    null
    )/Step_Goal__r.Goal_Field_Change_Handle_Time_Hrs__c
  ,null
)
HandleTimeVsGoal__c.label: Handle Time vs Goal

Initial_Timestamp_or_CREATED__c.inlineHelpText: Used in formula fields for handle time
Initial_Timestamp_or_CREATED__c.label: (Deprecated) Initial Timestamp orCREATED

Handle_Time_over_Weekend_Days__c.description: Note that this field is imprecise - it is just the total time (a number of days with decimal points) minus the weekdays, which are rounded up to the whole day. It is useful for adjusting time calculations to weekdays.
Handle_Time_over_Weekend_Days__c.inlineHelpText: Note that this field is imprecise - it is just the total time (a number of days with decimal points) minus the weekdays, which are rounded up to the whole day. It is useful for adjusting time calculations to weekdays.
Handle_Time_over_Weekend_Days__c.label: (Deprecated) HandleTime (over Wknd Days)

Flow_Goal_ID__c.description: Used by Process Builder: Assign Step Goal to Steps with matching Flow Goal
Flow_Goal_ID__c.inlineHelpText: The ID of this Step's Flow's Goal.
Flow_Goal_ID__c.label: (Deprecated) Flow Goal ID

StepVsTotal__c.inlineHelpText: Portion this step is out of the total Cycle Time.
StepVsTotal__c.label: Step % of Cycle Time

Plan_Next_Steps__c.inlineHelpText: How you intend to get to the next field change. What are the blockers? Why might you not get there?
Plan_Next_Steps__c.label: Plan/Next Steps

Start_Date__c.description: Used in calculation for Breach Happens At
Start_Date__c.label: (Deprecated) Step Started Date

StepActive__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    NOT(isGoal__c),
    NOT(Terminal_Stage__c),
    ISBLANK(Next_Step__c)
  ),
  true,
  false
)
StepActive__c.inlineHelpText: This flag identifies the steps your team is currently working through.
StepActive__c.label: Step Is Currently Active?

Type__c.inlineHelpText: Used to split different types of processes handled within the same object. If your process was held in an Onboarding object, you might have a Customer and Partner type of process, for example.
Type__c.label: Type

History_Record_ID_for_Last_Step__c.label: History Record ID for Last Step

Step_Goal__c.description: References the optimal time duration for the Step, allowing Step duration to be contrasted with the intended process time.
Step_Goal__c.label: Goal Step
Step_Goal__c.relationshipLabel: Tracker Steps with this Goal Step

Step_Handle_Time__c.formula:
IF( AND (Terminal_Stage__c, ISBLANK( Next_Step__c )) ,
null,
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c )),
	Field_Value_Ending_Timestamp__c - Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c,
	IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c)),
		NOW() - Field_Value_Initial_Timestamp__c,
		NOW() - CreatedDate
	)
))
Step_Handle_Time__c.label: Handle Time (Days in this Step)

Ending_Timestamp_or_NOW__c.inlineHelpText: Used in formula fields for handle time
Ending_Timestamp_or_NOW__c.label: (Deprecated) Ending Timestamp or NOW

InitialTimestamp__c.inlineHelpText: Used in formula fields for handle time
InitialTimestamp__c.label: Initial Timestamp or CREATED

Step_is_currently_active__c.formula:
IF(
  AND(
    NOT(isGoal__c),
    NOT(Terminal_Stage__c),
    ISBLANK(Next_Step__c)
  ),
  true,
  false
)
Step_is_currently_active__c.inlineHelpText: This flag identifies the steps your team is currently working through.
Step_is_currently_active__c.label: (Deprecated) Step Is Currently Active?

Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.description: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.formula:
IF( AND (Terminal_Stage__c, ISBLANK( Next_Step__c )) ,
null,
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( EndTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(
DATEVALUE(EndTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
-
(5 * ( FLOOR( ( DATEVALUE( InitialTimestamp__c ) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(
DATEVALUE(InitialTimestamp__c) - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) )
)
Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.inlineHelpText: Note that this formula rounds up to whole days
Handle_Time_Weekdays__c.label: (Deprecated) HandleTime (Wkdays in Step)

Handle_Time_Business_Hours__c.inlineHelpText: This field will be blank until you set up Business Hours and Activate the Flow called "Flowdometer - Autocalculate Business Hours"
Handle_Time_Business_Hours__c.label: Handle Time (Business Hours)

Last_Step__c.inlineHelpText: The Step Object that preceded this one
Last_Step__c.label: Last Step

Field_To_Track__c.description: A designated field within the monitored object whose alterations are tracked by Flowdometer.
Field_To_Track__c.inlineHelpText: Choose Field (eg: Status or Stage) you'd like to track changes on
Field_To_Track__c.label: Field To Track

Object_Name__c.description: The Salesforce object that is monitored by the Flowdometer listener.
Object_Name__c.inlineHelpText: Choose Object that has the field you'd like Tracked
Object_Name__c.label: Object To Track

Last_Check__c.description: Records the moment of the latest inspection for History records related to the monitored field within the Salesforce object.
Last_Check__c.label: Last Check

isActive__c.description: A feature that allows toggling the listener record state. When inactive, the tracking gets put on hold without having to erase the record.
isActive__c.label: isActive

Enable_History__c.description: Denotes whether historical querying of records is enabled for this Listener
Enable_History__c.inlineHelpText: Enable historical querying of records for this Listener
Enable_History__c.label: Enable History

Type__c.description: A classification attribute that enables sorting object-field trackers into subtypes to facilitate differentiated goal assignment.
Type__c.inlineHelpText:
OPTIONAL: Type should be blank unless you plan on having different goal times for different Types of this object (eg: New Business vs Renewal Opportunities may expect different sales cycle times). 

If so, put the API Name of the field you’re using to identify these types here in the Type field. If you need to combine two or more fields to get all Type permutations, you can build a formula field to concatenate them, and pass that in here. Use API Name here, so for custom fields, it should end with "__c"
Type__c.label: Type

Last_Execution_On__c.description: Keeps track of the instance of the last execution conducted by the Flowdometer code relevant to the listener record.
Last_Execution_On__c.label: Last Execution On

Next_Check__c.formula:
IF(
OR(ISBLANK(Frequency__c), Frequency__c = 0), Last_Check__c,
Last_Check__c + ( Frequency__c / 60 )
)
Next_Check__c.label: Next Check

Unprocessed_History_Records__c.inlineHelpText: This field saves unprocessed History Records in order to batch our processing
Unprocessed_History_Records__c.label: Unprocessed History Records

TerminalStage__c.inlineHelpText:
OPTIONAL: (do this more easily by setting a goal)
Hides final stages from overwheliming your reports (since they stay there indefinitely).

Create (or find) a formula field on the tracked object that returns true if your tracked field is in last step of your process. For example, for Leads there is a Standard Field called IsConverted, for Opportunities and Cases, IsClosed. Add all final stage options, such as Cancelled, Lost, etc. 

Specify this field with the API Name, here in Terminal Stage.
TerminalStage__c.label: Terminal Stage
